name: WordPress Plugin Development
description: PHP 8.2 environment for WordPress plugin development with PHPCS, PHPStan, and Codeception

commands: sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y php8.2 php8.2-cli php8.2-common php8.2-mbstring php8.2-xml php8.2-curl php8.2-zip php8.2-gd php8.2-sqlite3 php8.2-mysql
curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php && sudo mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer
